p: The chromatograms and structure of the main essential oils (EOs) of A. monosperma and L. crithmoides are shown in the Supplementary Materials (Figures S1 and S2). The results displayed that EOs of A. monosperma and L. crithmoides include 30 compounds for each plant ( Table 2). Three groups of organic EOs components (monoterpenes, sesquiterpenes and hydrocarbons), in addition to the diterpene group, were recorded in L. crithmoides.
